Articles.Content: I'm searching for a mod that adds stuff like cables, so that you need to connect a battery with all consumers via cables, having stuff like circuits so that electrics will be a new challenge when building rockets.
I don't think anyone has ever made one like that...
There was one. It makes the electrocharge consum more dinamic, and add new functions for the modules of your spacecraft but im afraid i can't remeber it's name. Sorry...
